name: lander
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a spacecraft designed to land on the surface of a planet or moon: The European Space Agency was scheduled to place a lander on Mars. They descend into darkness like astronauts in a lunar lander.
More examplesFewer examplesThe lander was designed to look for past or present life.A software error could have caused the lander's braking rockets to shut down prematurely.Two solar arrays will power the lander through its three-month mission.
